abstract: An investigation found that a distributor in China was the source of about a million fake blood sugar test strips that have turned up in at least 35 states and eight countries.
snippet: An investigation found that a distributor in China was the source of about a million fake blood sugar test strips that have turned up in at least 35 states and eight countries.
lead_paragraph: A global hunt started by Johnson & Johnson has tracked to China some counterfeit versions of the test strips used by 10 million Americans to measure their blood sugar levels.

headline.main: Bogus Diabetes Test Strips Traced to Chinese Distributor
headline.print_headline: Bogus Diabetes Test Strips Traced to Chinese Distributor
